00010 Float_t ORMksPdr2000Decoder::GetPressureOfChannel(UInt_t* record, UInt_t channel) 
00011 {
00012   if (channel >= GetNumberOfChannels()) return 0.;
00013   /* Don't access out of bounds! */
00014   return (*((Float_t*) (record + 2*channel + 2)));
00015   /* packed float into a 32-bit word. */
00016 }
00017 
00018 UInt_t ORMksPdr2000Decoder::GetTimeOfChannel(UInt_t* record, UInt_t channel) 
00019 {
00020   if (channel >= GetNumberOfChannels()) return 0;
00021   /* Don't access out of bounds! */
00022   return (record[2*channel + 3]);
00023 }

00025 
00026 std::string ORMksPdr2000Decoder::GetParName(size_t iPar)
00027 {
00028   switch(iPar) {
00029     case 0:
00030       return "Device ID";
00031     case 1:
00032       return "Units";
00033     case 2:
00034       return "Channel";
00035     case 3:
00036       return "Pressure";
00037     case 4:
00038       return "Time";
00039   }
00040   ORLog(kError) << "Parameter number out of bounds" << std::endl;
00041   return "";
00042 }
00043 
00044 UInt_t ORMksPdr2000Decoder::GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow)
00045 {
00046   switch (iPar) {
00047     case 0:
00048       return GetDeviceID(record);
00049     case 1:
00050       return GetUnits(record);
00051     case 2:
00052       return (UInt_t)iRow;
00053     case 3:
00054       return (UInt_t)GetPressureOfChannel(record, iRow);
00055     case 4:
00056       return GetTimeOfChannel(record, iRow);
00057   }
00058   ORLog(kError) << "Parameter number out of bounds" << std::endl;
00059   return 0;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void ORMksPdr2000Decoder::Dump(UInt_t* record)
00063 {
00064   ORLog(kDebug) << "*************** Dumping out data *************" << std::endl;
00065   ORLog(kDebug) << "Number of Channels: " << GetNumberOfChannels() << std::endl;
00066   for (size_t i=0; i<GetNumberOfChannels();i++) {
00067     ORLog(kDebug) << "Channel: " << i << std::endl
00068       << " Pressure: " << GetPressureOfChannel(record, i) << std::endl
00069       << " Time: " << GetTimeOfChannel(record, i) << std::endl;
00070   }
00071   ORLog(kDebug) << "********************************************************" << std::endl;
00072 }
